name: MavenSource
tag_list: recruiting, tech, sales, marketing, recruiter, recruiters, hiring, hire, full-time, employee, employees, talentview, talent, technical, web-2-0, startup, social-networking, bay-area, new-york, mobile-apps, gaming
overview:
MavenSource was founded on the principle that the more time spent getting the details, the better the results will be.

By finding out what your goals are and how your background will facilitate those goals, we can position you for the perfect career move. The amount of time spent on understanding the companyâ€™s position, strategy, and needs allows us to make sure only the right people are presented.

MavenSource believes in a team environment and has established a team of six experienced, well-trained, and knowledgeable recruiters that focus on sales and marketing positions. What this means to you as a candidate is that you will have up to six different people presenting you opportunities that are a match with your experience and career path. On the company side, this means one person contacting you and six working for you in obtaining the top talent.
